procedure.name: ScanRecord
procedure.statement: SELECT * FROM USERTABLE WHERE iotBench_KEY > ? AND iotBench_KEY < ?

procedure.name: UpdateRecord
procedure.statement: UPDATE USERTABLE SET FIELD1=?, FIELD2=?, FIELD3=? WHERE iotBench_KEY=?

procedure.name: InsertRecord
procedure.statement: INSERT INTO USERTABLE (iotBench_KEY, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3) VALUES (?,?,?,?)

procedure.name: ReadModifyWriteRecord
procedure.statement: UPDATE USERTABLE SET FIELD1=?, FIELD2=?, FIELD3=? WHERE iotBench_KEY=?
